column1: Our daughter was killed a few years ago, in our house.
Yes, because we certainly didn't do it! No.
Thank goodness we have each other to share our grief.
Oh, good. Maybe now they'll catch him.  Oh, here's another member of our support group.  O.J.
O.J.'s wife was killed by an uh, Some Puerto Rican Guy, too.
One of us! One of us!
